Detailed Description

Home Page representation.

Contains all the elements forming the Home page.

An instance exists for session life long, and each session having their own instance.

Definition at line 25 of file home.hpp.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

HomeWidget::HomeWidget ( Wt::WContainerWidget *  parent  )  [private]

Constructor.

Private to accept calls just from Instance() function. This way creation of HomeWidget objects with direct calls to constructor is rejected.

Parameters:
parent Parent container of HomeWidget instance

Member Function Documentation

void HomeWidget::bPciIds_Click (  )  [private]

Triggered on 'Update PCI IDs' button click.

Called on bPciIds_ button click event.

Downloads up-to-date 'pci.ids' file from http://pciids.sourceforge.net/v2.2/pci.ids and updates the database with current PCI IDs.

Definition at line 144 of file home.cc.

Here is the call graph for this function:

void HomeWidget::changeProxy (  )  [private]

Triggered on 'Save' button click for proxy address.

Stores the given proxy address in editProxy_ to '/tmp/proxy.harix', and displays dialogWarn_ in case of failure.

Definition at line 239 of file home.cc.

Here is the call graph for this function:

void HomeWidget::dialogDownload_Close ( Wt::WDialog::DialogCode  code  )  [private]

Triggered on dialogDownload_ close.

Depending on code value:

  • WDialog::Accepted
    Succesful download of 'pci.ids' file, update PCI IDs calling the update_pci_ids() function.
    Check whether update is successful and display dialogPciIds_ dialog window.
  • WDialog::Rejected
    Download failure, do nothing.
Parameters:
code dialogDownload_ close status; WDialog::Accepted or WDialog::Rejected.

Here is the caller graph for this function:

void HomeWidget::readProxyFile (  )  [private]

Reads the previously stored proxy address in server.

Reads the proxy address stored in '/tmp/proxy.harix' and puts it into settingsProxy_ variable.
